name: 陳貞光
objective: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
schedule:
Week 1- Ch.00 - Materials Science and Engineering - Overview
Week 2- Ch.01 - Introduction to Materials Science and Engineering
Week 3- Ch.02 - Atomic Structure and Bonding in Solids
Week 4- Ch.03 - Structures of Metals
Week 5- Ch.04 - Defects in Solids
Week 6- Ch.05 - Diffusion in Solids - I
Week 7- Ch.05 - Diffusion in Solids - II
Week 8- Ch.06 - Mechanical Properties - I
Week 9- Midterm Exam
Week 10- Ch.06 - Mechanical Properties - II
Week 11- Ch.08 - Failure of Metals
Week 12- Ch.09 - Phase Diagrams
Week 13- Ch.11 - Metals - Processing and Applications
Week 14- Ch.12 - Ceramics - Structure and Properties
Week 15- Ch.13 - Ceramics - Processing and Applications
Week 16- Ch.14 - Polymer - Structures
Week 17- Ch.15 - Polymer - Processing and Applications
Week 18- Final Exam
scorePolicy: 30%期中考，30%期末考，40%平時以及作業
materials:
Materials Science and Enigneering: An Introduction, by W.D.Callister, 7th Ed., 2007, John-Wiley & Sons.
